title: U.S. TV viewership selected games 2014 FIFA World Cup in Brazil
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different 2014 World Cup Matchess on X-axis for 2 groups ESPN/ABC, and Univision. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding TV viewership in million viewers.

Out of all 2 groups, ESPN/ABC had the highest TV viewership in million viewers in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) and Univision had the lowest TV viewership in million viewers in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).

In 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC), Univision had the maximum TV viewership in million viewers and it saw the lowest in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) out of all 8 2014 World Cup Matchess.

The maximum TV viewership in million viewers for Univision that was found in 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) was 2.71 times larger than the minimum TV viewership in million viewers observed in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different 2014 World Cup Matchess on X-axis for 2 groups ESPN/ABC, and Univision. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding TV viewership in million viewers.

2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) had the maximum TV viewership in million viewers among all 2 groups, and it was for ESPN/ABC. The minimum TV viewership in million viewers was observed in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) for Univision.

Out of all 2 groups, ESPN/ABC had the highest TV viewership in million viewers in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) and Univision had the lowest TV viewership in million viewers in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).

In 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC), Univision had the maximum TV viewership in million viewers and it saw the lowest in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) out of all 8 2014 World Cup Matchess.

The maximum TV viewership in million viewers for Univision that was found in 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) was 2.71 times larger than the minimum TV viewership in million viewers observed in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different 2014 World Cup Matchess on X-axis for 2 groups ESPN/ABC, and Univision. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding TV viewership in million viewers.

2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) had the maximum TV viewership in million viewers among all 2 groups, and it was for ESPN/ABC. The minimum TV viewership in million viewers was observed in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) for Univision.

In 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC), Univision had the highest TV viewership in million viewers among all 8 2014 World Cup Matchess and it has the lowest TV viewership in million viewers in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).

The maximum TV viewership in million viewers for Univision that was found in 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) was 2.71 times larger than the minimum TV viewership in million viewers observed in 2014 World Cup Matches Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN).
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum TV viewership in million viewers was found in case of ESPN/ABC.

Averaging all 2 groups ESPN/ABC, and Univision, the 2014 World Cup Matches World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) is the maximum TV viewership in million viewers and Opening match - Brazil vs. Croatia (06/12/14)(Univision & ESPN) is the minimum TV viewership in million viewers.

Group match - USA vs. Ghana (06/17/14)(Univision & ESPN)
Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN)

Round of 16 - USA vs. Belgium (07/01/14)(Univision & ESPN)
World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC)
